events.comment: Boolean (0 or 1): defines if fullscreen mode is off or on.
Defines if the <author> tag is available to be inserted in current post.
Defines if the <geo-latitude> tag is available to be inserted in current post.
Boolean (0 or 1): forces the "Post" button to be disabled.

sub-events.comment: When starts the app: shows the version, sets location empty in statusbar and sets post field/button's style.

action.param:
"

"

action.name: Append HTML
action.param:
"

"

sub-events.comment: If post's background data isn't empty in Web Storage, loads it.
If post's color data isn't empty in Web Storage, loads it.
If post's location data isn't empty in Web Storage, loads it.
If post's location tag data isn't empty in Web Storage, loads it.

action.name: Log
action.param: "Loaded post's location tag from Web Storage."

sub-events.comment: If Web Storage says here are posts: load post count from WebStorage and shows it in the app.
If no posts in Web Storage: start creating the app folders.

action.name: Write
Log
action.param: "Its your first time using Peeper. Welcome! Successfully created the folder C:\Peeper. Your posts will be in Peeper\posts."

action.name: Alert
action.param: "Its your first time using Peeper. Welcome! Successfully created the folder C:\Peeper. Your posts will be in Peeper\posts."

sub-events.comment: Recovers in-draft post when starting the app.

action.name: Alert
action.param: "The app was closed while tipping, and the draft was successfully recovered"

action.name: Log
action.param: "The app was closed while tipping, and the draft was successfully recovered"

sub-events.comment: Web Storage says there are posts but Peeper folder is missing, resets Web Storage and creates it again.

action.name: Write
Log
action.param: "Peeper folder is missing. But as the good app I'm: successfully created again the folder C:\Peeper. Your posts will be in Peeper\posts."

action.name: Alert
action.param: "Peeper folder is missing. But as the good app I'm: successfully created again the folder C:\Peeper. Your posts will be in Peeper\posts."

sub-events.comment: When clicked in "Post" button or pressed "P" keyboard shortcut: shows the saving post status, defines the number of post, saves the post count in Web Storage, create a folder for the post and writes the file of the post.

action.name: Write
action.param: "<mode>" & Mode & "</mode>" &"<timestamp>" & Browser.ExecJS("Date()") & "</timestamp>" & "<text>" & TextBox.Text & "</text>" & "<via>Offline Peeper poster app " & projectversion & "</via>" & geo & "<background>" & WebStorage.LocalValue("postbackground") & "</background>" & "<color>" & WebStorage.LocalValue("postcolor") & "</color>" & PhraseAuthor

sub-events.comment: Confirms if the post is already saved into disk. Then shows status/messages, empty the post field and resets his location/background, resets Web Storage that contains post's background/color/location data and shows post count in statusbar.
Don't reset the background if on quote/phrase or future insight mode.
If post field is empty: shows a tooltip, resets Web Storage about draftpost, and makes "Post" button disabled.

action.name: Set tooltip
action.param: "Click here and start tipping your post"

action.name: Get elements
action.param: "<input class=postdisabled type=button value=Post title=Write some content before posting>"

sub-events.comment: Else and if "Post" button is forced to disable by global value: shows tooltip and makes "Post" button enabled.

action.name: Get elements
action.param: "<input class=postbtn type=button value=Post title=If your post is done, click here to post/save it to your disk onclick=C2('post');>"

sub-events.comment: Every 2 seconds: saves the post as draft to prevent data loss when closing the app.
Activate the mode when clicked on a button.

event-group.title: Change text size according to charcount

sub-events.comment: F11 keyboard shortcut for Fullscreen mode.
If not in fullscreen, turn fullscreen on when pressed F11.
If already in fullscreen, turn fullscreen off when pressed F11.
Actions when clicked in geo button.
Tests if Geolocalization is currently supported in platform/hardware. "Post" button is disabled while this.
If geolocalization isn't supported: deletes location from statusbar, send messages, and makes "Post" button enabled.

If geolocalization starts sending location data: makes it available to be attached in post, saves it to Web Storage (for if app is closed and user opts to resume the draft sometime), shows in statusbar the location, and makes "Post" button enabled.
The above event uses the "Is" loop, so the log in console would show a message every second. So this is now set to Trigger once, bellow.
If geolocalization is supported but gets a error: send messages, deletes location from statusbar, makes "Post" button enabled, and clears Web Storage's location data.

action.name: Alert
action.param: "Error locating! Please try it in another device or upgrade your hardware."

action.name: Log
action.param: "Error locating! Please try it in another device or upgrade your hardware."

sub-events.comment: Sets the background of the post accourding to the button clicked.
Hover effect for post field.
